DataElement.preferredName: Expedited Report National Cancer Institute Submission Checkbox Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Notation that a report or observation of one or more adverse events that must be submitted within a specified amount of time due to the severity of one or more of the events was submitted to the National Cancer Institute (NCI).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Expedited Report National Cancer Institute Submission
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A report or observation of one or more adverse events that must be submitted within a specified amount of time due to the severity of one or more of the events._The National Cancer Institute, part of the National Institutes of Health of the United States Department of Health and Human Services, is the Federal Government's principal agency for cancer research. The National Cancer Institute conducts, coordinates, and funds cancer research, training, health information dissemination, and other programs with respect to the cause, diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of cancer. Access the National Cancer Institute Web site at http://www.cancer.gov._Something submitted for the judgment or consideration of others.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A report or observation of one or more adverse events that must be submitted within a specified amount of time due to the severity of one or more of the events.

Concepts.definition: A report or observation of one or more adverse events that must be submitted within a specified amount of time due to the severity of one or more of the events.

Property.preferredDefinition: NCI.  The National Cancer Institute, part of the National Institutes of Health of the United States Department of Health and Human Services, is the Federal Government's principal agency for cancer research.  NCI conducts, coordinates, and funds cancer research, training, health information dissemination, and other programs with respect to the cause, diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of cancer.  Access the NCI Web site at http://cancer.gov.:Submission; a message submitted for the judgment of others.

Concepts.definition: The Federal Government's principal agency for cancer research. NCI conducts, coordinates, and funds cancer research, training, health information dissemination, and other programs with respect to the cause, diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of cancer. Part of the National Institutes of Health of the United States Department of Health and Human Services.
Something submitted for the judgment or consideration of others.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the outcome or resolution of the patient's adverse events.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator determining determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Select the checkbox to submit
ReferenceDocuments.description: Select the checkbox to submit the expedited report to NCI
